Arginine, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Saccharomyces/ Xylinum/Black Tea Ferment, Xanthan Gum, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Malt Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Yeast Ferment Extract, Tocopherol
